statements: UPDATE fashion_sales_data SET unit_price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101;

UPDATE fashion_sales_data SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 5 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE fashion_sales_data SET unit_price = unit_price * 0.9, quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 3 WHERE product_id = 1002 AND category = 'Shoes';

UPDATE SalesData SET sale_amount = sale_amount * 1.1 WHERE product_name IN ('Product B', 'Product C');
UPDATE Inventory SET available_units = available_units - 5 WHERE product_name = 'Product D';

UPDATE Inventory SET stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE Trends SET trend_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE trend_id = 3;
UPDATE Sales SET sale_amount = sale_amount + 100 WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE Inventory SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 1, last_stock_update = NOW() WHERE product_id = 123
